log_summary: Login request timed out while calling user-service
root_cause: User-service experienced high latency due to database lock
resolution: Optimized DB query and added timeout retry logic

log_summary: Null reference error during payment validation
root_cause: Missing null check on payment gateway response
resolution: Added validation checks before processing payment

log_summary: Order creation failed due to inventory-service unavailability
resolution: Rolled back deployment and restarted service

log_summary: Multiple requests rejected due to rate limit policy
root_cause: Improper rate limiting configuration after scaling

log_summary: Failed to connect to SMTP server while sending email
Billing transactions failed due to DB connection pool exhaustion
root_cause: Connection leak in billing worker threads
resolution: Fixed connection leak and increased pool size

log_summary: User update failed due to foreign key constraint violation
resolution: Corrected database schema and added validation

log_summary: High latency observed due to frequent cache misses
Service failed to load environment configuration
root_cause: Missing environment variable in production config

log_summary: Payment gateway API timed out after 30 seconds
JWT validation failed for multiple incoming requests
root_cause: Expired signing key used by auth-service
resolution: Rotated signing key and updated validation config

log_summary: Database deadlock detected during order placement
root_cause: Concurrent transaction conflict in order table

log_summary: Auth-service pod restarted due to memory exhaustion
root_cause: Unreleased session objects in authentication handler

log_summary: Message queue backlog caused delayed notifications
root_cause: Consumer scaling not aligned with traffic spike

log_summary: Application failed to connect to Redis cache
root_cause: Redis instance not running after maintenance
resolution: Restarted Redis service and added health checks
